I found that out two years ago :p

Daniel Paul Hightower <alternate_dph@...> wrote:You can accumulate money by letting slime multiply, killing all but one of them, and end up restoring the slime to full experience level 
with money left over.

Hence, the slime on my current team is called "Revenue".
